text: Eghtɨ benir ataghatariba ko benir kuraba otiv, nɨn azenimɨn aghung anevaragham. Egh nɨ dagheba inisɨ, ingangarir ekiabar amutɨ, doriba nɨn agham. Egh nɨ zurara kamaghɨra puvɨra ingar mangɨ, ovegh uamategh nguazimɨn mangam. Guizbangɨra, kɨ nguazimɨn nɨn ingari, ezɨ nɨ uamategh nguazimɨn mangam.”
